original_text: I will bring trouble to Ariel. The people there will be very sad and they will weep. Ariel will become like my altar for burnt offerings.
korean_text: 내가 아리엘을 괴롭게 하리니 그가 슬퍼하고 애곡하며 내게 아리엘과 같이 되리라

sentences.original_text: I will bring trouble to Ariel
The people there will be very sad
Ariel will become like my altar
sentences.korean_translation: 아리엘은 나의 제단 같이 될 것이라
